ygData.subject: Re: Did some testing....
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes it has to be equipped. ... ______________________________________________________ Get Your Private, Free Email at http://www.hotmail.com
ygData.messageBody:
Yes it has to be equipped.


>From: "Sylly Songsynger" <jgs@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com

>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Did some testing....
>Date: Wed, 23 Feb 2000 07:58:32 -0600
>
>When do you get the sv MR +5? Only when it's equipped in the melee #2
>slot?
>
>Sylly.
>
>p.s. camped out in the Plane of Fear... I sure hope everyone is still there
>when I get back tonight ;o
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Rokenn Swiftsong <rokenn@...>
>To: <EQBards@onelist.com>; <EQ-Bards@onelist.com>
